attributes.comment:
We are awaiting a referral from China for our little girl which the wait has more
than doubled. Due to the slow down we have to re-do I600A form and finger
prints. There should be an extension put on our documents not to have to resumit
and surely if we have to re-submit their could be a decrease in cost instead of the
proposed increase which is quite absurd. This is truly a way of taking advantage
of good citizens who are taking in little girls not wanted in another country who will
have no quality of life if not adopted. I am proud of being a citizen of the US and
know the government has the best interest for it's people. Please accept my
comment and do the right thing. Thank you. Linette Thornbury Cincinnat, OH.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Linette Thornbury
